item.title: From Org-mode marukup to Markdown
item.description: Here are how ox-hugo convert markups (like bold, mono) in Org to Markdown. item.title: Do not put TOC in Summary
item.description: By default, The TOC generated by ox-hugo is inserted into “Summary” in Hugo. This is how to prebent it (Taken from ox-hugo test site). Copy summary_minus_toc.html Copy summary_minus_toc.html from this site. summary_minus_toc.html summary_minus_toc.html looks like this: Code Snippet 1: layouts/partials/summary_minus_toc.html (html) {{- with .Description -}} {{- . | markdownify | printf "<p>%s</p>" | safeHTML -}} {{- else -}} {{- $summary_has_org_toc := substr .Content 0 30 | findRE "[\".

item.title: Reference to LaTeX math in ox-hugo
